title: Brand New Heavies - Best Of 20 Years [2011] [only1joe]FLAC-EAC
description:
Brand New Heavies - The Best Of 20 Years [2011] [only1joe] FLAC-EAC

[img]http://s22.postimg.org/9izwk4voh/Brand_New_Heavies_The_Best_Of_20_Years_Front.jpg[/img]

2011 collection from the Acid Jazz maestros. The Brand New Heavies rode the early-'90s Acid Jazz wave to find well-deserved transatlantic fame. Approved and sequenced by the band themselves, this compilation gives the fullest picture yet of a British music institution whose unique mix of Jazz, Funk and Soul has lit up the dance scene for well over two decades, and continues to do so..
